charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_1101_010:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] happened
across Ash and Pikachu training together.
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_1201_030:
The strength of these “sync pairs” depends on the
strength of the bond between the Trainer and their
partner Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_1201_040:
So let’s practice using moves together until we’re
more in sync than ever!
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_1201_050: OK, ready? Let’s hit that rock with a sync move!
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_1201_060:
Right, I just need to feel my heart sync
with Pikachu’s...
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_1201_080: H-huh? That electrical charge looks bigger than—
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_0401_120:
Oh, you saw that, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Don’t worry! I’m fine!
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_0401_130:
Pikachu’s shocked me plenty of times before, so
I’m used to it!
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_0402_150:
Oh, didn’t see you there,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Yeah, Pikachu’s
electricity sure is impressive!
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_1201_160:
Looks like Pikachu and I may have overdone it
a little.
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_1201_180:
It reminded me of the day we set off from
Pallet Town.
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_0401_200:
Yeah! Pikachu and I had just met. He was my very
first partner...
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_0402_220: Well, Pikachu was my very first partner...
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_1201_230:
At first, we didn’t get along, and he kept
shocking me all the time. It was a lot to deal with!
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_0401_250: Heh heh... You could say that!
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_0302_260: You didn’t put him in a Poké Ball?
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_0402_270:
My Pikachu doesn’t like Poké Balls. I know—it’s
really unusual!
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_1201_280:
But I wanted to get along with Pikachu more than
anything, so I decided I’d just meet him head on.
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_1201_290:
While all that was going on, I got attacked by
a flock of Spearow...
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_1201_300:
but Pikachu drove them all away with his
electricity. He saved me!
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_1201_310:
That was the first time I felt like we actually
understood each other’s feelings and finally
became friends.
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_1201_320:
Since then, I’ve traveled around all sorts of
different regions and made loads of other friends...
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_1201_330: And Pikachu’s been with me through it all!
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_1201_340:
I’m confident that the bond between me and
Pikachu is as strong as any sync pair’s on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_1201_350:
So Pikachu and I are sure to keep getting stronger
and stronger from here on out!
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_1201_360:
All right! That’s got me all fired up! Come on,
Pikachu! Let’s get back to training!
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_1201_370:
Why don’t you join us,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]? I’m sure we’ll have
a gr—
charaepi_ch0264_00_satoshi/2301_1201_380: Heh heh... Maybe we should eat first?
